document.query: CREATE TABLE `favourite_list2` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `categ_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `product_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `client_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `disabled` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `created_at` datetime, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
